title: QAPI Controller
description:
Implement QAPI Metrics Controller for Quality Tracking and Improvement Initiatives

Create a comprehensive controller to manage QAPI (Quality Assurance and Performance Improvement) metrics tracking, reporting, and improvement initiative lifecycle management.

Requirements:
- Design and implement RESTful API endpoints for QAPI metrics CRUD operations
- Support creating, reading, updating, and deleting quality metrics and performance indicators
- Implement endpoints for managing improvement initiatives with status tracking (planned, in-progress, completed, on-hold)
- Enable linking metrics to specific improvement initiatives
- Provide data aggregation and filtering capabilities (by date range, department, metric type, initiative status)
- Implement input validation and error handling with meaningful error messages
- Support metric trend analysis over time periods
- Include pagination for list endpoints
- Add proper authentication and authorization middleware
- Document API endpoints with request/response schemas

Data Management:
- Define data models for metrics (type, value, target, measurement date, responsible party)
- Define data models for initiatives (title, description, goals, timeline, status, assigned team)
- Establish relationships between metrics and initiatives
- Implement data persistence layer with appropriate database queries

Testing and Documentation:
- Write unit tests for controller logic
- Create integration tests for API endpoints
- Document endpoint specifications (OpenAPI/Swagger recommended)
- Include example requests and responses in documentation
